revisionDesc.change: Submit - updated inv.no. in collection data
Commit - updated inv.no. in collection data

Finalized - Added most changes suggested except marking l. 17 as <:ἢ=papyrus|ed|καὶ=MSS:> so that the papyrus reading is displayed in the text (similarly l. 29), and not changing ἀρθείς to grave (in accordance with West's convention that oxytona at the end of a verse keep the accent).

Finalized - Added most changes suggested except marking l. 17 as <:ἢ=papyrus|ed|καὶ=MSS:> so that the papyrus reading is displayed in the text (similarly l. 29), and not changing ἀρθείς to grave (in accordance with West's convention that oxytona at the end of a verse keep the accent).
Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - In order to speed up processing, I am voting this through by depending upon Sampson's comments (agreed in discussion 4.5.2022)
Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - In order to speed up processing, I am voting this through by depending upon Sampson's comments (agreed in discussion 4.5.2022)

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - A few adjustments to the text: in l.5 replace curly brackets with square ones; l.6 --> ἀρθεὶς; l.9 --> <:[ἔγν]ω πρόσθεν|subst|[ἔγν]ωι ποσθεν:> ; l.10 --> <:Ὀϊλῆος|reg|Ὀειλῆος:>; in l.36 add .? to rightmost lacuna; in l.17 should we have <:καὶ=MSS.|ed|ἢ:> instead of |reg|?; in l.29 should we have <:ὑπερκ[ατέβησαν]=MSS.|ed|ὑπεκκ[ατέβησαν]:> instead of |reg|? Metadata: MP3 number is 901.0; I would have the display name list the whole passage (i.e., 13.58-99) since the omission of 13.67 is noted elsewhere; also add a link to http://id.lib.harvard.edu/alma/990099573690203941/catalog to the online resources.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - A few adjustments to the text: in l.5 replace curly brackets with square ones; l.6 --> ἀρθεὶς; l.9 --> <:[ἔγν]ω πρόσθεν|subst|[ἔγν]ωι ποσθεν:> ; l.10 --> <:Ὀϊλῆος|reg|Ὀειλῆος:>; in l.36 add .? to rightmost lacuna; in l.17 should we have <:καὶ=MSS.|ed|ἢ:> instead of |reg|?; in l.29 should we have <:ὑπερκ[ατέβησαν]=MSS.|ed|ὑπεκκ[ατέβησαν]:> instead of |reg|? Metadata: MP3 number is 901.0; I would have the display name list the whole passage (i.e., 13.58-99) since the omission of 13.67 is noted elsewhere; also add a link to http://id.lib.harvard.edu/alma/990099573690203941/catalog to the online resources.
